name: ricardian
description: > [DOCS](https://ricardian.gitbook.io/ricardian-llc/) ðŸ“• [ARTICLE](https://medium.com/lexdaoism/ricardian-llc-limited-liability-nft-f64a162f751b) An entirely on-chain representation of limited liability companies minted as NFTs, governed by [LexDAO](https://twitter.com/lex_DAO) as a public good for ethereum business. The name and concept of Ricardian LLC is inspired by "[ricardian contracts](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ricardian_contract)", *i.e.*, agreements that are recorded with legal and code-based efficacy.
